prompts: Create a spooky ghost-type Pokemon with a unique body shape and haunting features.
I want to see a Pokemon that embodies darkness and mystery, with a ghostly appearance.
Generate a design for a ghost-type Pokemon that has a distinctive eye and eerie hands.
Make a Pokemon that represents shadows, featuring a floating body and a haunting expression.
Imagine a ghostly creature with a unique silhouette and menacing claws, perfect for a spooky setting.
Design a Pokemon with a haunting presence and ghostly traits that lurk in the shadows.
Give me a ghost-type Pokemon with a unique design that can blend into dark environments.
